short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily save and store all prompts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AllMyPrompts is an innovative Chrome extension designed to enhance your productivity and boost your creativity. It allows users to save, manage, and access their frequently used text prompts in a convenient and intuitive way. Whether you're coding, writing reports, or brainstorming ideas, AllMyPrompts is a valuable tool that can streamline your workflow. The extension also comes with a collection of sample prompts to inspire your writing. Additionally, it features a user-friendly interface and easy navigation. Experience a smoother, more efficient writing process with AllMyPrompts.
